title: David Berger National Memorial: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do       Following restoration in 2006, The David Berger Memorial was placed on the grounds of the Mandel Jewish Community Center (JCC). Visitors to the memorial have access to JCC grounds but access to the National Park Service Passport Cancellation Stamp is limited to the open hours of the JCC reception desk. See Operating Hours & Seasons.
